affect ( "mirror_guy1", /*@AFFECT_TYPE*/ FLUSH )
{

	task ( "mirror_corner1b" )
	{
		set ( "SET_TASK", "Path" );
		set ( /*@SET_TYPES*/ "SET_NAVGOAL", "mirror1b" );
	}


	task ( "mirror_corner2b" )
	{
		set ( "SET_TASK", "Path" );
		set ( /*@SET_TYPES*/ "SET_NAVGOAL", "mirror2b" );
	}

	dowait ( "mirror_corner1b" );
	dowait ( "mirror_corner2b" );
}
